isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER - INSTALL - SHIFT LEVER ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Install the backup light switch and pin ( Figure 104).

figure.caption: Figure 104. Shift Lever Assembly - Install Backup Light Switch

step1.para: Shift all forks into neutral, then install the three air control valve pins ( Figure 105).

figure.caption: Figure 105. Install Air Control Valve Pins

step1.para: Bench shift the transmission to make sure it is working correctly ( Figure 106).

Insert the three poppet balls and springs into the case ( Figure 107). Place the interlock into the interlock retaining plate, and install the assembly at this time. Adjust the interlock to the proper position for a forward or center control. Secure the plate with two bolts.

figure.caption: Figure 107. Insert Poppet Balls and Springs Into Case

step1.para: Install the air control valve and gasket ( Figure 108). Tighten to 52 to 62 ft-lbs. (70 to 84 N•m). Refer to Figure 111 when re-installing air lines.

figure.caption: Figure 108. Install Air Control Valve and Gasket

caution.para: Cut lines squarely to ensure a proper connection. Always use a razor-sharp edge to cut tubing. Never use side cuts.

step1.para: Install a new gasket and the shift lever assembly ( Figure 109). One gasket must be in place to ensure proper gear selection. If this gasket is eliminated, binding may occur.

figure.caption: Figure 109. Install New Gasket and Shift Lever Assembly

caution.para: Do not apply sealant to the shift lever assembly or main case. It could prevent proper interlock functioning.
